players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm not sure what happened to Diana last night, but I'll keep an eye on everyone."
Charlie: "I'll continue to investigate and keep an eye on Alice, as she's the mafioso."
Bob: "I'll keep a low profile and try to gather more information about what happened to Diana. I think it's important for us all to stay cautious."
